user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (info@rainbowfertility.com) with the details we need for our consultation. Ask her to check her Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Next Steps for Your Rainbow Fertility Care Consultation

Hi Jane,

Thank you for your interest in scheduling an initial consultation with Rainbow Fertility Care. To help us prepare, could you please send an email to info@rainbowfertility.com with the following details?

• Your full name and preferred pronouns  
• Your partner’s name and preferred pronouns (if applicable)  
• A brief overview of your fertility goals or concerns  
• Relevant medical history or previous fertility treatments (if any)  
• Preferred days/times for an appointment (including time-zone)  
• Any additional questions you’d like us to address during the consultation  

For your convenience, we’ve outlined these points—and any other helpful guidance—in your Notion workspace. Please check Notion before replying so you can include everything we need in one email.

Once we receive your information, we’ll reach out to confirm your consultation slot.

We look forward to supporting you on your path to parenthood!

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
Rainbow Fertility Care  
info@rainbowfertility.com  
+1 (555) 123-4567
